Type.description: Promotion type identifier used to declare relations (for example, a promotion rule or category name).

Relation.description: Defines how conflicts between two promotion types are handled.

left.description: The left-hand promotion type in the relation.

right.description: The right-hand promotion type in the relation.

strategy.description: Conflict resolution strategy between the left and right types: LEFT_BEFORE_RIGHT applies the left type before the right one; LEFT_DISQUALIFIES_RIGHT prevents the right type from applying when the left type is present.

conflictResolution.description: Conflict resolution configuration for the Promotion Engine.

types.description: List of all promotion types that can appear in conflict relations.

relations.description: Pairwise relations describing how conflicts between promotion types should be resolved.

validFrom.description: The date and time from which this configuration is valid.
